chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Irrevocable Words
chapters.info: The Empress (of Seanchan), p. 432 (552)—Ruler of Seanchan. She is considered to be a direct descendant of the first emperor of Seanchan, Luthair Paendrag Mondwhin. She presides over the Court of the Nine Moons on the Seanchan continent. See also Paendrag Tanreall, Artur.
